metadata.title: CVE-2023-38058 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: An improper privilege check in the OTRS ticket move action in the agentinterface allows any as agent authenticated attacker to to perform a moveof an ticket without the needed permission. This issue affects OTRS: from8.0.X before 8.0.35.

criterions.comment: znuny package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
